Package tage.ai.behaviortrees

Class BTRepeat

java.lang.Object
tage.ai.behaviortrees.BTBehavior
tage.ai.behaviortrees.BTDecorator
tage.ai.behaviortrees.BTRepeat
public class BTRepeat extends BTDecorator
BTRepeat is a BTDecorator node that processes its child nodes a specific number of times before returning a return status. If during one of these repeat the child node returns BH_FAILURE then the repeat node returns BH_FAILURE. BTRepeat is analogous to adding a loop to a behavior tree.
See Also:

    • BTRepeat

      public BTRepeat(BTBehavior child, int repeatCount)
      Constructs a BTRepeat node encapsulating a child node and setting the repeat count.
      Parameters:
      child - The child node.
      repeatCount - The number of times the child node should be processed before the repeat node returns.

  • Method Details

    • onInitialize

      protected void onInitialize()
      Resets the nodes repeat counter to zero.
      Overrides:
      onInitialize in class BTBehavior

    • update

      protected BTStatus update(float elapsedTime)
      Updates the BTRepeat node. Continually executes its child node until either 1) the child returns BH_FAILURE in which case the repeat node returns BH_FAILURE, 2) the child returns BH_RUNNING in which case the repeat node returns BH_INVALID, or 3) the child has executed the specified number times in which case BH_SUCCESS is returned.
      Specified by:
      update in class BTBehavior
      Parameters:
      elapsedTime - Time since the last call to BaseGame.update()
      Returns:
      The return BTStatus of the node.
